subject: Basketball
Halls of Fame
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Basketball (College)
organizations: National Collegiate Basketball Hall of Fame
lead_paragraph: Three college stars who eventually became Knicks were named to the National Collegiate Basketball Hall of Fame: Patrick Ewing, Earl Monroe and Willis Reed.
snippet: Three college stars who eventually became Knicks were named to the National Collegiate Basketball Hall of Fame: Patrick Ewing, Earl Monroe and Willis Reed.
